attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The young drivers act that allows the dvlc to take a young drivers license away from him should be made illegal this is blatant discrimination against young people one solicitor should get of is chair and take the goverment to the europian courts of human rights 
this is just a money making scam i call for this act to be abolished there should be a three month ban

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
